description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Triple A Studios presents a ridiculously short and silly joke RPG! Beat the game in less than a second and earn bragging rights for a REAL accomplishment. Solve it again and again to experience every ending!  Updated with 8 new endings!
